name: ROBOCTOPUS Womens V Neck Tee...Sm, Md, Lg, Xl
description:
POOR LITTLE DIVER, DO YOU REALLY THINK THAT DINKY LITTLE SPEAR WILL SAVE YOU FROM THE ROBOCTOPUS?

This is a screen printed shirt with AQUA ink on a MARINE colored V NECK TEE (made by alternative apparel).

The shirt is available in Women's small, medium, large and extra large (please note which size you want in the seller notes) All illustrations are original straight from Mikey's sketchbook and are drawn with Micron pens.

PLEASE NOTE WHICH SIZE YOU WANT IN THE SELLER NOTES

MEASUREMENTS:
SMALL - BUST:32-34 WAIST:26-28 HIP:36-38
MEDIUM - BUST:34-36 WAIST:28-30 HIP:38-40
LARGE - BUST:36-38 WAIST:30-32 HIP:40-42
X LARGE - BUST:38-40 WAIST:32-34 HIP:42-44

name: SKULLOPUS Unisex Hoodie
description:
FEAR THE KISS OF THE MULTI-TONGUED SKULLOPUS!!!!

This is a screen printed hoodie with cream ink on a heather gray ALTERNATIVE APPAREL HOODIE. the hoodie is available in small, medium, large and extra large

(please note which size you want in the seller notes)

All illustrations are original straight from Mikey's sketchbook and are drawn with Micron pens.

MEASUREMENTS-

SMALL CHEST-36/38 WAIST-29/31 HIP-34/39
MEDIUM CHEST-39/41 WAIST-32/34 HIP-37/42
LARGE CHEST-42/44 WAIST-35/37 HIP-40/45
XL CHEST-45/47 WAIST-38/40 HIP-43/48
